name: Mattar Aloo (Potato and Peas Curry)

ingredients.notes: pureed or 1/2 cup canned tomato puree

instructions: In a pan, heat oil over medium heat.
Add cumin seeds and let them sizzle for a few seconds until fragrant.
Add chopped onions and saut√© until golden brown.
Stir in the ginger-garlic paste and cook for 1-2 minutes until the raw smell disappears.
Add the pureed tomatoes, turmeric, coriander powder, cumin powder, red chili powder, and salt.
Cook until the mixture thickens and oil begins to separate from the spice mixture (about 5 minutes).
Add the diced potatoes and mix well with the masala.
Pour in water, cover, and simmer for about 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Once the potatoes are almost tender, add the green peas.
Cook for another 5 minutes until the peas are soft and the gravy is thickened.
Stir in garam masala and mix well.
